title: Create your own South Park Character
content:
[http://spstudio.elena.hosting-friends.de/spstudio.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228/http:/spstudio.elena.hosting-friends.de/spstudio.html "http://spstudio.elena.hosting-friends.de/spstudio.html")

It might not be a type character but it's a character

\*\*updated link added my moderator\*\*

\>\> [http://www.sp-studio.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228/http:/www.sp-studio.de/ "http://www.sp-studio.de/")
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
Come on at least make yourself if you're posting this! :D Here I am...I think!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dwbsouthpark.png)

L'anarchist c'est moi!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JHSP.gif)

(Okay, so it would have been a more accurate portrait about 18 years ago...)
Haha your post made me laugh, John.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Aargh.jpg)

ChrisL
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic.png)
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shinnSP.png)

Nick! It's YOU man! :-)

ChrisL

Aha. I was going to post this link, but chickened out. Glad someone posted it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/southparkme.png)
Alright.

What happened to "Dude"?  
:-)

ChrisL
Here is my image
BTW those spots are being used as freckles in this instance. :^/

This is the closest I get...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sp-me.gif)
Nick, that is frighteningly realistic.
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/number2.png)

Dude, this is WAY too accurate.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/speben.jpg)

Here I am…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dan.png)

Why stop with self-portraits? I started trying to do Matthew Carter, but ended up with...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GMSP.gif)
How do you post a picture? I get the screen shot but when its a photoshop file how do you upload it? Brain Cramp
Dan, there should be a little 'Insert image' link below the Comment field. Note that you need to have the Flash 8 Player installed.

Dan, you need the flash 8 player - then the image attach will work. 'A player?' you ask... Yes a player.

But it works.

I've just thought of a great new Typophile feature. In addition to the Typeface ID Board, we can have the Type Designer ID Board. How quickly can you identify this famous type designer:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NNSP.gif)

I got the image-thing working now, thanks!

Lovin' the Gary Munch, John.

Guess who!?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sp-hrant.gif)
hhp should enjoy that one!

Paul,

You got it! :-)

I see Hair Reynolds has nailed it all the way from Germany :-)

ChrisL

That must be Tiffany black :-)

ChrisL

Somebody else from Typophile...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sp-lozos.gif)
Is that meant to be Thomas P?

Eben,

Actually, it's what I imagine Chris looking like from that one picture in drag and the avatar... ;-)

Here's me:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/simonson.gif)

Eben,

Here's Thomas P! :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sp-tom.gif)

Lauri,  
"I resemble that remark" Pretty darn close!  
ChrisL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chrisl.jpg)

Mark,  
You look MUCH younger that that picture :-)

ChrisL

\> we can have the Type Designer ID Board

Good idea :)

who's that:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/illus1.png)

Ahemmm...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SouthPark-NF.jpg)

I thought I should try for a more up-to-date self-portrait, in case anyone tries to use this thread as a reference for identifying me at a conference.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JHSP2.gif)

Matthew Carter is really tricky, but it's something like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MCSP.gif)

Unfortunately, the ponytail options in South Park are quite limited. Matthew has much better hair than this. I thought about editing it in Photoshop, but decided I liked the discipline of trying to make likenesses with the limited options available. The glasses are the wrong shape, but there's a great photo of Matthew looking over the top of his glasses like this.

It is very difficult to get a good selection for Gerry Leonidas' hair, but the classroom provides nice context:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GLSP.gif)

Ed Benguiat. I wish there were an option for a proper flight jacket.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EBSP.gif)

Jerry Calona?

ChrisL

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/southpark%20me%20copy.jpg)

That's me.  
Those aren't clouds. It's the snow we got today.

K.
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/guerella.jpg)

Yves:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yves.gif)
Not quite condensed enough. =^D
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/me.jpg)
I tried making Yves but yeah I wasn't happy with the lack of Condensed options :-/

Actual me:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/H%C3%A9ctor%201.jpg)

Self projected me:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/H%C3%A9ctor%202.jpg)

Héctor

Norbert, HILARIOUS.

This is fun, makes me want to get a haircut.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017132228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/zed_park.jpg)
